item.title: DuckDB demo and showcase

item.description: Event Date Discord Channel Type 23/11/2023 ðŸŽ™ãƒ»labs-stage Internal DuckDB has been an emerging OLAP database for analytical needs. Use cases for analytics usually use around 1GB-10GB of data, not enough to take advantage of the full potential of databases in data warehouses.
